fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the day, you can realize you don't have to sit there all day. You can instead go up to someone and stab them, instantly dealing a Powerful attack.
- At night, you realize your door has a lock. You can choose to use it, and all visits towards you will fail.
- At night, you realize you can defend yourself. You can attack all your visitors.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may attack as many people as you want during the day, but once you kill a Townie, you may no longer kill.
- You have the common sense to refuse to walk to the gallows if you are voted to be hanged. You cannot be hanged.
- If someone targets you twice in a row when your door is locked both nights, they will smash your window and their ability will not fail. It must be twice in a row for it to trigger.
- Conversion immune, because you refuse to join them.
- Control immune, because you refuse to do what they tell you to do.
- Roleblock immune, because you leave the house anyways.
- Redirect immune, because you'll track down your target.
